overview:
Michael has been involved in design and implementation of multimedia software tools for over 20 years.

At Apple Computer he was involved in open systems platforms, focusing primarily on developing multimedia infrastructure and core system software which was used in multi-platform QuickTime and became the basis for the development authoring platform Carbon on Mac OS X.

At Entera, CacheFlow and Generic Media, he honed his management and product design skills to produce Internet infrastructure hardware and software, primarily focused on HTTP and streaming media protocols.
